CustomField.formula:
(Total_Deposits_40__c + Total_Deposits_41__c + Total_Deposits_42__c + Total_Deposits_43__c + Total_Deposits_44__c + Total_Deposits_45__c + Total_Deposits_46__c + Total_Deposits_47__c + Total_Deposits_48__c+Total_Deposits_49__c + Total_Deposits_50__c +Total_Deposits_51__c ) /
if( if(Total_Deposits_40__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_41__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_42__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_43__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_44__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_45__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_46__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_47__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_48__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_49__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_50__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_51__c =0,0,1)=0,1,if (Total_Deposits_40__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_41__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_42__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_43__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_44__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_45__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_46__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_47__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_48__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_49__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_50__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_51__c =0,0,1) )
CustomField.label: Avg Total Formula
